welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tondo, Philippines! Get ready to experience the vibrant culture, historical landmarks, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore our city and soak in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Wai Ying Fastfood (嶸嶸小食館)
restaurants.description: Wai Ying Fastfood (嶸嶸小食館) is a chinese restaurant located in Maynila.
restaurants.address: Masangkay St (btwn La Torre St & Luzon St), 1012 Maynila, City of Manila

restaurants.name: Tasty Dumplings
restaurants.description: Tasty Dumplings is a chinese restaurant located in Maynila.
restaurants.address: Masangkay Street, Maynila, City of Manila

restaurants.description: Pepper Lunch Express is a japanese restaurant located in Maynila.
restaurants.address: 4th Flr, Lucky Chinatown Mall, Reina Regente St, 1006 Maynila, City of Manila

restaurants.name: Wai Ying Fastfood (嶸嶸小食館)

restaurants.name: Lord Stow's Bakery
restaurants.description: Lord Stow's Bakery is a bakery located in Maynila.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it is the newest terminal at the airport and exclusively serves Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at the airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Formerly known as the Domestic Terminal, it is now used for low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 2 hours per device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baler Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
